description: This dataset presents the World Happiness Report, which ranks countries based on their happiness scores and various contributing factors. It includes factors such as happiness rank, happiness score, economic factors, social support, health, freedom, generosity, trust in government, and residual dystopia.

data_columns.name: Happiness Rank
data_columns.description: Rank of the country based on happiness score.

data_columns.name: Whisker High
data_columns.description: High end of the confidence interval for happiness score.

data_columns.name: Whisker Low
data_columns.description: Low end of the confidence interval for happiness score.

data_columns.name: Trust (Government Corruption)
data_columns.description: Trust in government factor: perception of corruption.

source: CSV file containing World Happiness Report data.
size: Variable (depends on the number of countries included)
accessibility: The data will be made freely available to the public.
reuse_conditions: The data can be reused and redistributed with proper attribution.
provenance: The data has been collected and curated for the purpose of analyzing global happiness.
data_quality_assurance: Quality assurance processes have been implemented to ensure the accuracy and reliability of the data.
